info.author: Nir Soffer
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Hebrew Python is a translation of Python to Hebrew that let you write scripts mixing regular Python and 
Hebrew.

By adding other language files, you can create your Python versions in other languages easily.

You can browse the source in http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/hpy/.

You can get the source wirh rsync or with Bazaar_::

    bzr get http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/hpy/

.. _Bazaar: http://bazaar-vcs.org/
info.name: hpy
info.html_description:
Hebrew Python is a translation of Python to Hebrew that let you write scripts mixing regular Python and Hebrew.

By adding other language files, you can create your Python versions in other languages easily.

You can browse the source in http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/hpy/.

You can get the source wirh rsync or with Bazaar:

bzr get http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/hpy/
